tool_description: Determines customer service tier and associated escalation policies based on customer profile, contract details, and account status.
error_messages: Customer not found: The provided customer_id does not exist in the customer database. Verify the ID is correct.
Account data incomplete: Customer profile lacks required information for tier classification. Update customer record.
Invalid account type: If provided, account_type must be one of [individual, business, enterprise].
usage: Provide customer_id to retrieve tier classification and escalation policies. Optionally specify account_type to override automatic detection.

dedicated_support.description: Whether customer has dedicated support team
